summary: The diff implements comprehensive LG branding across all components, including logo replacement, LG Heritage Red color theme, updated typography, card styling, form styling, and iconography. All requirements appear to be fully addressed with consistent application of the LG brand identity throughout the service center page.

hallucinated_features.description: Added custom box shadow utility 'lg-card' with LG red color tints
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not specify custom shadow utilities with LG red color tints. While shadows were requested, the specific implementation with rgba(165, 0, 52, ...) color tints goes beyond the requirement for 'subtle shadows'.

hallucinated_features.description: Added 'Life's Good' tagline in header right section
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-9 requested updating the tagline, but the diff shows the tagline placed in a new right-side section of the header. The BuildRequest specified maintaining the existing header layout structure (REQ-13 AC), which may not include this new right-side positioning.
